title: gAngEyan padamE
sahitya:
gAngEyan padamE gatiyenat-tudippEn


anupallavi

  tIngEdum ini ennait-tAngAdu pAdukAkka pAngODu tuNai tandu tAngi aNaindiDa


caraNam    paDi mIdil muDivilAda aDuttaDuttu varum iDarEdumE endanait-toDarAdu maraindiDa
kaDugaLavEnumE enda kavalaiyilum tOyAmal neDunAL nilaittiDum nimmati nilaviDavum
